泿字的基本解释

泿
yín
〔泿水〕古河名，在今中国广西壮族自治区。
古同“垠”，边际。

泿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yín］
［《廣韻》語巾切，平真，疑。］
［《廣韻》五根切，平痕，疑。］
泿水。古水名。上游即今广西壮族自治区东北部洛清河，中下游指柳江、黔江、西江。

泿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泿； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页619第13
【廣韻】語巾切【集韻】魚巾切，?音銀。水名。【山海經】禱過之山，泿水出焉。【水經】泿水，出武陵鐔城縣，北界沅水谷。　又【玉篇】水厓也。【集韻】亦作垠。　又【廣韻】吐根切，音吞。又【集韻】語靳切，音憗。義?同。

泿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
泿字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
yín
[Yishui] The name of the ancient river is in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region of China today.
Gu Tong "Yin", marginal.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yín］
["Guangyun" is cut, plain and suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" five root cuts, flat marks, doubts. ]
Yishui. Ancient water name. The upper reaches are the Luoqing River in the northeast of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, and the middle and lower reaches are the Liujiang, Qianjiang, and Xijiang.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　泿; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 619 13
[Guangyun] Yujin cut [Jiyun] Fish towel cut, silver tone. Water name. [Shan Hai Jing] The mountain of praying over, the water flows out of Yan. [Shui Jing] Yishui, out of Wuling Fucheng County, north boundary Yuanshui Valley.　[Jade articles] Shuiya also. [Jiyun] also for Yin.　[Guangyun] spit the root and cut it, sound swallowed. Also 【Ji Yun】Yu Jin Qi, Yin Yang. Righteous? Same.
Yi

Yi
Name meaning
Nothing.
yín
I сущ.
вм. 垠 (берег)
II собств.
геогр. (сокр. вм. 泿水) Иньшуй (ныне义江 , река в пров. Гуанси)
